script:
[00:00-00:01] Open with a sun-drenched beach (wide shot, vibrant colors).  
[00:01-00:02] Close-up of the beverage bottle glistening with condensation (smooth pan around).  
[00:02-00:03] Slow-motion pour of the drink into a glass, ice clinking (dynamic shot).  
[00:03-00:04] Group of friends laughing, raising their glasses, the bottle in the foreground (focus on joy).  
[00:04-00:04] Fade out to brand logo with tagline (elegant transition).
